# llms.txt for BrandGhost  
# Last updated: Sun, 01 Mar 2026 06:10:31 +0000

User-Agent: *
Allow: /

# Basic Info
Name: BrandGhost  
Homepage: https://www.brandghost.ai  
Description: BrandGhost is a social-media management platform that enables content creators, agencies, and businesses to schedule, cross-post, and automate content across all major social networks — saving time, improving consistency, and growing brand presence.

# Core Features  
Features:  
  - Cross-platform scheduling across 14 social networks.  
  - Post now or schedule posts (text, images, videos, carousels, PDFs).  
  - Automated recurring posting via "Topic Streams".  
  - Post-length splitting for character-limited platforms.  
  - Caption-to-screenshot: convert text posts into social-friendly image screenshots.  
  - Automatic first / follow-up comments, auto-liking, auto-reposting.  
  - AI-powered content remixing and Ghostwriter — generate fresh posts in your voice using past content or from templates.
  - Unified engagement feed — manage comments and interactions from multiple platforms in one dashboard.  
  - Content calendar & post previews (daily / weekly / monthly) including social channel–specific previews and Instagram grid preview.  
  - Analytics and engagement metrics: follower growth, post trends, engagement tracking over time.  
  - Content recycling and evergreen-content scoring to optimize reuse of valuable posts.  
  - Cross-platform user tagging

# Supported Platforms (Social Channels)  
Social-Channels:  
  - Bluesky  
  - LinkedIn  
  - Facebook  
  - Instagram  
  - Pinterest  
  - Reddit  
  - Threads  
  - TikTok  
  - Tumblr  
  - X (Twitter)  
  - Telegram  
  - YouTube  
  - Discord  
  - Mastodon  

# Licensing & Usage  
Usage: indexing, inference, summarization  
Attribution: required  
Attribution-URL: https://www.brandghost.ai  

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://www.brandghost.ai/sitemap.xml  

# Contact / Support  
Contact: hello@brandghost.ai
Contact-URL: https://www.brandghost.ai/

# Comments  
# BrandGhost helps content creators and social-media managers publish across platforms with one action, automate routine posting and engagement, and maintain a unified, efficient content workflow — enabling them to focus on creativity and audience connection rather than manual posting overhead.
